I've made some puzzles in the past

## Puzzle hunts

Beware, as almost all of these hunts were made to be solved in person at a specific time.
It turns out that I like putting physical components in my puzzles. I'll put warnings in
the appropriate puzzles.

{% assign hunts = site.pages | where: "page-type", "hunt" %}
<ul>
{% for page in hunts %}
    <li>
        <h4 class="no-margin-bottom"><a href="{{ page.url | relative_url }}">{{ page.title }}</a> ({{ page.hunt-date }})</h4>
    </li>
{% endfor %}
</ul>

## Logic puzzles

* [Sanshoku L](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/?m=edit&) (for a logic puzzle contest involving L shapes. It won 2nd place!)
* [Sanshoku Rectangle](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/?m=solve&&) (like Sanshoku L, but with rectangles)
* [Hikari Akari](https://puzz.link/p?akari/11/10/sccci7.gclbj1.......bhbbk.h.m.hbjdg..cq)
